The Boat

This is an interactive audio/visual story about a true incident. It is retold by the four different people who experienced the event.

The story is separated into six chapters. To listen, hover over the icons with your mouse. When you are done with one, you may scroll down to the next chapter, or listen to another perspective in the same one.





Headphones are recommended.

Enter

Preamble















Into the Water















The Flip















The Rescue















The Return















Reflection















Thank you for listening.



How does sentiment and emotion play a role in our memory recollection?

How does memory distort or alter over time with relation to the emotional attachments that coincide with that memory?

What does the role of subjectivity play in a shared memory regarding how it is remembered?







Replay the Experience
